Item 2.02 Results of Operations and Financial
Condition.

On April 15, 2025, The PNC Financial Services
Group, Inc. (“PNC”) issued a press release
regarding PNC’s earnings and business results
for the first quarter of 2025. A copy of PNC’s
press release is included in this Report as
Exhibit 99.1 and is furnished herewith.

In connection therewith, PNC provided
supplementary financial information on its
website. A copy of PNC’s supplementary
financial information is included in this
Report as Exhibit 99.2 and is furnished
herewith.
